name: Time Juice
description:
Time Juice is
A game about time. How did you get here and why is everything obsessed with time? You only have one juice to save you. Make it count!

Theme
One Time Use

Comfort
Medium/Intense

Special Thanks to:
@elastiskalinjen

Note
There is a PCVR build as well, however it is not well tested as I don't own any PC HMD. Feel free to ping me for any issues. Should work with any OpenXR.

Time Juice was made in 7 day for the #vrjam2022
